author: elecharny
msg: o Transformed the TwixTransformer to be a static class, with static methods
o All the method in this class are now public, so they can be used outside of this package

author: amassari
msg: The wrong constructor was called, causing a memory leak (XERCESC-1840)

author: amassari
msg: The wrong constructor was called, causing a memory leak (XERCESC-1840)

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-2822: Add caching of store stream length in StoreStreamClob, if appropriate.

StoreStreamClob is a read-only representation of a Clob, and will now cache the character length after it has been obtained the first time. Getting the length initially is still expensive, as the UTF-8 data stream has to be decoded.
